Online class is available for PreK-1st grades ONLY.

Get Started!

What We Do

Classes

We offer classes for PreK-12 and adults year around.

Competition

We offer guide and advice to middle and high school students entering the Scholastic Art and Writing Competition.

Annual Art Show

We hold an art show every summer to showcase students' artworks for the year.

Summer Camp

We provide the summer classes. Students will make fun projects while working with different media.
